Items.Title: Resolution approving an exemption from real property taxes for property located (Block 2534, Lot 8) the Bronx, pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law (L.U. No 853).
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: LU 853 - Block 2534, Lot 8, Bronx, Community District No. 4, Council District No. 16.
